**`r getReportMetadata(ts,'title',required=TRUE)` Report**

**Location:**  `r getReportMetadata(data,'stationId',required=TRUE)` `r getReportMetadata(data,'stationName',required=TRUE)`

**Sub-Location:** `r getReportMetadata(data,'sublocation',required=TRUE)`

**Period** `r getReportMetadata(data, 'startDate')` to `r getReportMetadata(data, 'endDate')`

**Time Series:** `r getReportMetadata(data,'inputDataDescriptions1')`, `r getReportMetadata(data,'inputDataDescriptions2')`, `r getReportMetadata(data,'inputDataDescriptions3')`

`r if (length(author) != 0) { paste("**Author:**",author[[1]]) }`

`r if (length(author) == 0) { paste("**Author:** Username")}`

**Created:**  `r Sys.time()`

***
   
Maximum for period, based on 365 equivalent days of record. 
   
```{r,echo=FALSE,comment=NA,warning=FALSE,results='asis',out.width ='900px'}

library(xtable)
tbl <- sitevisitpeakTable(data)
#kable(tbl,align='l')
df <- data.frame(t(sapply(tbl,c))) 
if (output=='html') {
  options(xtable.comment = FALSE,xtable.caption=NULL,xtable.type="html",xtable.include.rownames=FALSE)
  #stargazer(df, type="html", summary=FALSE, rownames=FALSE, flip=TRUE, header=FALSE) 
  xtable(tbl)
  } 

if (output=='pdf'){
  options(xtable.comment = FALSE,xtable.caption=NULL,xtable.type="latex",xtable.include.rownames=FALSE)
  #stargazer(df, summary=FALSE, rownames=FALSE, type="latex", title="", header=FALSE, flip=TRUE)
  xtable(tbl)
}
```
